description: Try our easy to follow Open Mexican Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Open Mexican Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the pastry cases among serving plates. Spoon the beef mixture among pastry cases. Top with sour cream and coriander leaves to serve.
